评论详情: Nice quality, I wear it for work often. Restaurant uniform so lots of wear and tear. No problem so far the only negative would be that’s it’s warm.
Very stretchy material. Sleeves long enough to hold a little in your hand. I ordered a small and my measurements are 36-28-38. Fit great!

评论概述: I should have paid closer attention to the fabric content
评论详情: There is no cotton in this T-shirt. The lack of cotton makes it a little too slinky for my tastes. I feel like the T-shirt fits a little bit too tight and without any cotton, it just clings to and exploits every little imperfection. I never wear bra and this T-shirt makes it all too obvious. It’s nearly 100% rayon with a small amount of spandex, which requires delicate wash cycle and lay flat drying. (IMO, equals wrinkles) I purchased the olive green color, it’s OK, but a little bit more like a drab military khaki green than olive green. I like the top well enough, I considered sending it back for a large (medium being my true size) but I think that the shoulders would be too wide in a large. Unfortunately, this one just is going back, it’s too bad. I really did like the style.
The material is thick and perfect and the slim fit with a little stretch makes the fit feel great.
Fits exactly like picture- -form fitting, nice fabric. looks great dressed up or casual.
Very cute but way too form fitting.  If you have a perfect figure it will be fine.
It is perfect, color is perfect, I was very comfortable in this shirt. It’s very soft and looks really good on.

This shirt has a wonderful feel.  The sleeves are long and the item fits as stated.  The color is nice and the color really dressed it up for casual bars or wear it with a suit jacket for work.  Bought the black one too.

I was looking for work shirts that were more than a button down.  I came across these and wasn’t sure but bought two. Great color selection and they look fantastic on.  Nice thickness of material and good value for the money.
Classic, flattering and form fitting. The material is soft, stretchy and comfortable. This top will go with any outfit.
I came back and ordered more in other colors. I wear them for work and casually. They are good quality and look great! Definitely recommend!
Warm & fuzzy on the inside. Form fitting. Giving 4 stars because the black was a little washed out so more of a dark dark grey. Order the same shirt from MangoPop for a jet black version.

I'm 5'9, 145 lbs, with a long torso.  I bought this in the blue, Size M.  I am extremely impressed with the quality of the fabric. I wore this for Christmas Day.  Not see-through.  Fits in all the right places. Not too hot.  Good for dressing up and dressy casual.  Now, the fit is snug; however, it's stretchy fabric. I just washed it in cold - hung up in my bathroom to dry. You will not be disappointed with this purchase.

I'm five weeks postpartum and was struggling finding clothes that made me feel good about myself. This shirt is a great fit - it flatters all the right spots and doesn't emphasize my postpartum tummy.

Love the look and feel. It fits just right. I wear a small and purchased a small. Will buy other colors.
I purchase this top in 3 colors and I am very happy with my purchase.  I am 5’11 and wear an XL.  Great choice to dress up or down- fabric has a nice body to it!

Fits well and very comfortable. I bought 5 in total.

My boobs look great in it. I also think they are made well and will last while, so good value for the money. The size was perfect. The length is perfect. Not too long or too short.

I have been looking for a shirt like this for a while, but could never find one that fit well. I love the length and material of this top! I’m usually between an XL and a XXL. I ended up getting the XXL and I could have sized down, but I love that the XXL is a smidge bit looser, but not too loose.

I recently purchased this Shirt, and overall, I'm quite pleased with it. The first thing that stood out to me was the quality of the fabric. The material is soft to the touch but feels durable, with just the right amount of thickness to make it comfortable year-round. It has a nice, crisp feel when you put it on, making it perfect for both work and casual settings.  The fit is true to size. I went with my regular medium, and it fits comfortably around the shoulders and chest, with a slightly tailored waist that gives it a flattering look without feeling too tight. The length is perfect — not too short or too long — so it works well whether tucked in or worn untucked.

High quality top, an easy way to make an outfit look more put together with the collar. I got the small in black and it's perfect for work. Very cute and form fitting. The material is on the thinner side but not so thin that it's see through. I want to get all the colors!

Very comfortable, soft and flattering. There is a really great stretch to the fabric so I can get away with either a SM or M. The material isn’t too thin that it’s see through or too thick that you overheat. Love these honestly, long sleeve & short sleeve - I always recommend. They wash and dry nicely with zero pilling.
I love the look and feel of this shirt. However, the upper arms are a little snug (which I like), so that might be an issue if that’s not your best feature.

This has become my favorite top for the fall, the color suits me well and the fit is amazing. The fabric is soft and breathable, and the collared neck doesn't move or lose its shape. I will be getting more of these in different colors soon!
This is a flattering shirt if you like a snug fit. The material is thick enough to not appear cheap; it is also mildly soft and stretchy. I am 5’7”/128, and the small fits perfectly.
I really like the way it stretches to fit my curves, which makes it really comfortable to wear all day at work. The color is really pretty too. I love the dark chocolate brown for fall.
I loved this so much that I bought it in almost every color!  I’m a big fan!!

The material is a little slippery so a cardigan is easy to wear over and fuzz does not stick like some other fabrics. Washed well!

This shirt has a comfortable stretchy fit and is very flattering. The fabric is soft and and quality is great. I like the longer sleeves and the v-neck with collar. I want in every color! I sized down for a more slim fit.

I'm impressed. The material is thick, arm length is perfect and the fit is very flattering. After reading some of the reviews, I was expecting a thinner material, but it will definitely be perfect for fall/winter. For reference, I am 5'6, 118 lbs and I purchased the small.

This top looks exactly as pictured. The fabric is a good weight and not see thru. The fabric is a stretch ribbed material so there is some give to it but it was a bit smaller than expected. The sleeves are nice and long but the torso was a hair shorter than I would have liked.

I was unsure about this style but I love it! The V isn't too deep (I'm quite large-chested) but its still very flattering! I feel like I could wear this to a church function, its very appropriate. The material is soft and stretchy but keeps its shape well - the cuffs are still nice and snug on the wrists at the end of the day, which is to say that it doesn't stretch out the way some others do. The color is pretty dusty though, so be aware of that! Its not a rich deep red.  This is one of my go-to shirts for this fall! Its versatile and can be dressed up or down.
